description:
At The Law Offices of Frederick W. Nessler and Associates, Ltd., in Springfield, Illinois, our attorneys have stood by many clients who have suffered a personal injury. When you experience a car accident, workplace injury or defective product, it is imperative to turn to a legal professional who can help. The system may be overwhelming without the guidance of a qualified attorney. We are there to give you advice, hold your hand and protect your right to seek financial justice from the negligent party or parties.

 

One key aspect of claims concerning nursing home neglect, medical malpractice or a catastrophic injury is to outline the damages you have suffered. Here in Illinois, that may include the cost of your medical care, the time you missed from work, and your pain and suffering. The team at our law office identifies every single way your life has been changed due to your injury such as the development of depression or anxiety, ongoing physical discomfort, or the inability to return to work and make a living for yourself and your family.

 

The Law Offices of Frederick W. Nessler and Associates, Ltd., offers free initial consultation, and we handle cases involving clergy and institutional sexual abuse; drunk, uninsured or distracted drivers; asbestos and mesothelioma, and wrongful death. We represent people throughout the state of Illinois, including those in Decatur, Chicago and Champaign.
